spell.name: Taurus
spell.combatDescription: * Place The Magician on Taurus. * While Taurus has a card on it, any damage the player generates is multiplied by 2 (Clever: 3). * You may discard the card played on Taurus whenever you choose.
spell.skillDescription: * Use Taurus to make a Skill check for a skill marked "Strong" as if it were Easy, once per Day.
spell.flavor: The bull is an unstoppable force.
